title: Employee of the Month
desc: During my employment as Marketing Advisor at Webcoder-IT Institute, I was designated the 'Employee of the Month' award for the month of May 2020. This was due to a number of successful marketing campaigns during the aforementioned month.

title: Class Honor Roll Award
desc: I was placed on the Honor Roll for the academic year of 2019, for excellent performance in grade 12.

title: Best Performer Award
desc: I received the 'Best Performer Award' from UCSKS for Project S1, as the most generous donation and contribution during the year of 2020.
